author: LongWinded
title: ‘Good Guy With A Gun’ Was On UCC Campus At Time Of Massacre
text: Good Guy With A Gun Was On UCC Campus At Time Of Massacre User Name Thanks This was based on a 2011 state court decision invalidating efforts to ban guns at public universities in Oregon. Public colleges like UCC are permitted to exclude concealed weapons from certain buildings and facilities but not the campus in general. . hey lie and they lie.
